title: Crane Island
creator_credit: Raymond Garceau, Leonard Frost and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A visit to one of the many tiny islands in the St. Lawrence River. Flocks of snow geese and other migratory birds, annually attract hundreds of sportsmen. Accompanies a party of visiting hunters as they bring down a plentiful bag. Shows the daily life of the French Canadian inhabitants who find a hardy but wholesome existence on the island’s bountiful lowland.
